channel.title: Strategic Realignment on FinanClub

item.title: PARA
item.description: score:82 Chances: Paramount Global is gaining from the rising demand for high-speed Internet and increased media consumption. Paramount Global-B (PARA) showed a small negative change in the recent trading day, indicating potential stability in the stock. The decision to sell its stake in Viacom18 to Reliance Industries could indicate strategic realignment and focus on core business areas.
